content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Interesting idea.

Challanging in reverse, in think - but very rewarding if one gets it.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: C'est une bonne idée ! Ni trop dur, ni trop facile.
Plusieurs étapes, convertir, replace, etc... ça peut aussi être sympa en mode reverse ! comme dans les autres modes ! Mais le reverse m'aurait régalé !

I'm agree With Leuti, he problems and easy to resolve with the Goal but in reverse modegoal does not appear, maybe you should add some test case with 1 for help to understand what we should do in reverse mode
Cool problem. Not sure if it's easy/obvious enough for reverse mode though but I really enjoyed solving it in fastest.
